issue.title: [C++] Add sqrt binary scalar kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15614](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15614). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The list of execution engine's binary scalar kernels currently available in `cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_arithmetic.cc` does not cover the common sqrt function (Split from ARROW-15571).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15614?focusedCommentId=17495166) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12412
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12412>
